RLumModel Shiny

‘RLumModel Shiny’ is a Shiny app providing a graphical user interface for the R package ‘RLumModel’. The app allows visualising the results from simulating charge transfer in quartz.

Installation and usage

if(!require("devtools"))
  install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("JohannesFriedrich/RLumModelShiny@master")

The application can be run on a local machine with the following command:

RLumModelShiny::run_RLumModel()
